alert.note: Alert for Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 6:22PM CDT until May 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 622 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Uchee, or near Hurtsboro, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hurtsboro, Uchee, Rutherford and Hatchechubbe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
